ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
IMAS Composer provides a clean, declarative API for mapping DIII-D diagnostic
and analysis data (stored in MDSplus) to standardized IMAS v3.41.0 data
structures (IDS - Interface Data Structures). It handles requirement
identification, data transformation, COCOS conversions, and composition.
about.summary: A Python library for converting DIII-D MDSplus data to IMAS format

about.description:
IMAS Composer provides a clean, declarative API for mapping DIII-D diagnostic
and analysis data (stored in MDSplus) to standardized IMAS v3.41.0 data
structures (IDS - Interface Data Structures). It handles requirement
identification, data transformation, COCOS conversions, and composition.
about.summary: A Python library for converting DIII-D MDSplus data to IMAS format

name: imas_composer
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "imas_composer" %}
{% set version = "0.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}
source:
  url: https://github.com/GA-FDP/imas_composer/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: df54ee704bf1d4dfdde98a68e97dd76b90e6884ea5d4bdcb8b1b59c3865fc5e6

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools >=61.0
    - wheel
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy >=1.20
    - pyyaml >=5.4
    - awkward >=2.0

test:
  imports:
    - imas_composer
    - imas_composer.ids
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/GA-FDP/imas_composer
  summary: A Python library for converting DIII-D MDSplus data to IMAS format
  description: |
    IMAS Composer provides a clean, declarative API for mapping DIII-D diagnostic
    and analysis data (stored in MDSplus) to standardized IMAS v3.41.0 data
    structures (IDS - Interface Data Structures). It handles requirement
    identification, data transformation, COCOS conversions, and composition.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://github.com/GA-FDP/imas_composer/blob/main/README.md
  dev_url: https://github.com/GA-FDP/imas_composer

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - arewedreaming
    - modestmc
    - smithsp
    - sammuli
